title: Central America (Caribbean region II)
brief_description: The climate, geography, economic interdependence on the rest of the world, the industries, and the peoples of Central America, are studied briefly in this film. The region’s position and importance in the Carribbean area, and its political history from the time of Columbus to the present, are sketched with the aid of animated diagrams.
